jcr:content.jcr:title: G302 - Thrall
jcr:content.searchTitle: Daedalus Prime G302 MOBA Gaming Mouse
jcr:content.seoDescription: G302 Daedalus Prime MOBA gaming mouse was designed for professional players and maximum play time. Learn more.

copyblock.altText: Take a closer look at G302
copyblock.mainTitle: Take a closer look at G302
Take a closer look at G302

media_tile.text: We worked directly with professional MOBA players to design features and playability from the ground up. Delta Zeroâ„¢ sensor technology ensures accurate tracking while button durability is built to withstand high speed clicking for hours on end.

media_tile_654806920.text: MOBA games are tough on mouse buttons, with commands regularly issued multiple times per second. The mechanical button tensioning system keeps left and right mouse buttons precisely tensioned to improve response and feel, making in-game actions fast and accurate click after click.

media_tile_777233576.text: Achieve great results with the default configuration straight out of the box, or set up one-button triggers for complex actions. Put push-to-talk communications in easier reach. Temporarily down-shift DPI for sniping. Reassign any game command or multi-command macro to any one of six programmable buttons with Logitech Gaming Software (LGS).

media_tile_842265300.text: On-the-fly DPI shifting lets you toggle between up to 4 sensitivity settings with a click, from pixel-precise 250 DPI targeting to super quick 4,500 DPI movement. Use LGS to customize the DPI settings to fit your style of play. Also, DPI cycling lets you choose from up to five DPI settings while in-game.

media_tile_1548322686.text: The lightweight design, ultra-durable switches tested to 20 million clicks, and super low friction feet make it comfortable to use even for long gaming sessions.G302 has been optimized for fingertip and claw grips to ensure a balanced feel.

_x0033_.subtext: Max. acceleration: >20 GTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0034_.subtext: Max. speed: >120 IPSTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
